Posts.Content: Not-So_Dandy_Dani wrote: hi, im not the one who could/does have breast cancer, and im not going to pretend i do.  but i am on this website for a reason.  you see, my mom just went for a biopsy, and she gets her test results back on monday.  im really worried for her, i mean, shes my mother, and, i dont want to lose her. i came here hoping for someone who could help me out.  i dont know what to do, ignore it or expect the worst.  Please, help!  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: my mom might be diagnosed Not-So_Dandy_Dani leaf
